compass.title: Financial Compass
compass.description: Represents the time you could live without external income while maintaining your current expenses.
compass.tip: By finishing debts and saving, this number grows to protect your lifetime.

available.title: Total Available
available.subtitle: Income - Fixed Expenses
available.info: Your declared income minus fixed monthly expenses. It's the total amount available for your shared accounts.
available.description: Keeping this pool positive ensures your fixed commitments are covered.

disposable.title: Money to Enjoy
disposable.subtitle: Your margin today
disposable.info: Your real margin today. It's the money left free after securing your monthly expenses and debts.
disposable.description: This is the money you can spend today guilt-free without compromising your future.

masterGoal.title: The Master Goal
masterGoal.description: At Easy Finance, we don't accumulate money, we accumulate TIME. Our shared goal is to reach 1,000 days of freedom.

burnRate.title: The Burn Rate
burnRate.description: Living has a cost. Your 'Burn Rate' is how much money you need each day to keep your world spinning without debt.

realStructure.title: Real Structure
realStructure.description: To win, you must first measure. Set up your Fixed Liabilities (rent, credits) and Assets to calibrate your financial base.

magicVoice.title: Magic Voice
magicVoice.description: Don't waste time writing. Use the microphone and say: 'bought sushi for 25 bucks'. The system will understand the amount and impact automatically.

freedomDays.title: Freedom Days
freedomDays.description: The final result: how many days you can live today if you stopped working. Every dollar saved buys lifetime!

netWorth.title: My Real Wealth
netWorth.tooltipContent: The difference between everything you have (Assets + Savings) and everything you owe (Credits).
netWorth.tooltipDescription: It's the value of your final freedom if you decided to liquidate everything today.
netWorth.positiveMessage: Your net worth is positive. You're building real wealth beyond your monthly cash flow.
netWorth.negativeMessage: Your debts exceed your current assets. Every contribution to the common fund is a step toward recovering your net worth.

welcome.title: Welcome to Easy Finance!

welcome.masterYourFreedomDesc: Learn the philosophy of the 1,000 days with our interactive routine.

survival.label: On the Edge
survival.description: Critical State. You don't have enough breathing room for the month. The goal is to get out of here fast.

security.label: Solid Ground
security.description: You have a 3 to 6 month cushion. You're protected against unexpected events.

flexibility.label: Walking Alone
flexibility.description: You can start making decisions without immediate pressure.

independence.label: Master of my Time
independence.description: Congratulations! You have more than a year of life secured.

abundance.label: Total Freedom
abundance.description: You've reached the top. Your time today is 100% yours.
